physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a body of water where people are swimming in. At the right hand side of the photograph, tall trees can be spotted, as well as people who are sitting on the edge of the water. Fences can be seen protruding horizontally from the land into the water. The background of the photograph shows land masses in the distance towards the horizon.
title_text: People Swimming within a Fenced Area Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Bodies of water Swimming
